trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around September 21st 2006
divs: Sighting Details i dont type or spell well so bare with me . i had just picked up my 6 yr old son from sitter .we were sitting at a stop light and my son said look at the ufo daddy i giggled and said were son and he pointed out my window and sure enough there it was . shiney fat disk just sitting in the air kind of pulsating from the sun light i grabed my cellphone and got some 10 second video . then i reset my phone and started to video again light turned green and had to go then it took off pretty quick . and a few days ago i was at the same intersection and sence it happend before i allways look into the sky there and there it was again i took cell phone picture of it i can send that to u i can allso text cell phone movie too.
Summary: Just sat in the air then moved off into clouds.
